description:
Lay down. Meditate or nap. And enter a biosonic harmonic journey...

Led by an expert, we're excited to host a regenerative sound bath that will help you reconnect with your self and activate your theta state.

Learn more about the expert: https://www.talia-ra.com/en/article/gong-bath

- -

There are yoga mats in the Dome but we might not have enough for everyone. So if you have a mat in your apartment please bring your own! Also, feel free to bring a pillow if that will help you get comfortable. We will be lying down during the Gong bath.
